bug.author: 14H034160212
bug.summary: A small issue by using the multiprocessing_bpe_encoder.py
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
Hi, there is a small issue by using the multiprocessing_bpe_encoder.py. It shows the error of unrecognized arguments: --keep-empty. Does anyone know the error? Many thanks. <denchmark-code>usage: multiprocessing_bpe_encoder.py [-h] [--encoder-json ENCODER_JSON] [--vocab-bpe VOCAB_BPE] [--inputs INPUTS [INPUTS ...]] [--outputs OUTPUTS [OUTPUTS ...]] [--keep-empty] [--workers WORKERS] multiprocessing_bpe_encoder.py: error: unrecognized arguments: --keep-empty </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: I found the issue is on the -- keep-empty rather than --keep-emptycd. It is my stupid issue. Sorry about that.
